title: Alien v. Predator
description: A face-off in court no one can forget. Watch the true story of how Alien took on Predator.
altHero: Xenomorph from Alien in front of a jury, trying on a glove that doesn’t quite fit
alt1: Predator, in a courtroom, leans to whisper something to Johnnie Cochran
alt3: Marcia Clark’s head has been chopped off and a janitor mops up the blood as a man casually eats a sandwich nearby
alt4: Xenomorph and his little mouth guy eat a sandwich
